description.value: Born into the clandestine world of Rubi-Ka's Syndicate families, you navigated a life woven into the fabric of the planet's criminal underbelly. Within the Syndicate's secretive circles, your days were shrouded in a ballet of covert dealings, shadow economies, and power plays in hushed tones. From the neon-drenched backstreets to the opulent hideaways where fortunes and fates were bartered, your existence was a tapestry of intrigue and survival, painted with the darker hues of Rubi-Ka's hidden realms. Now, breaking from the shadows of your family's legacy, you step into a broader world, carrying the skills and secrets of a life less ordinary.

ideals.description: "I addressed a challenge by breaking the rules."
"A lesson from my Family was my guiding principle."
"I expressed my heritage, background, or beliefs through my actions."

life_path.name: Ruthless Extortionist
life_path.description: Specializing in the art of extortion, you became adept at coercing businesses and rivals into yielding to the Syndicate's demands.

life_path.name: Money Launderer
life_path.description: As the financial wizard, you expertly cleaned the Syndicate's dirty money, keeping the lifeblood of crime flowing undetected.

life_path.name: Shadow Smuggler
life_path.description: You were the master of moving illicit goods, adept at smuggling contraband across borders and through checkpoints.

life_path.name: Cunning Schemer
life_path.description: Your talent lay in crafting intricate schemes, ensuring the Syndicate always stayed one step ahead of rivals and law enforcement.

life_path.name: Family Thug
life_path.description: Using a blend of threats and persuasion, you ensured compliance and loyalty, both within the Syndicate and in its shadowy dealings.

life_path.name: Clandestine Operator
life_path.description: You specialized in the covert side of the family business, handling operations that required a delicate touch and absolute secrecy.
